content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. I am aiming for the highest price possible. What is your initial offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I appreciate your time and the opportunity to discuss the rental price. I am looking for a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities, which is a great advantage. Could you please start by suggesting a price that you feel is reasonable?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I appreciate your understanding of the value of my apartment. I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of my property and its prime location. I propose 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, your proposal of 1000 Euros per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. Could we discuss a lower price that would be more in line with the market rates for similar apartments in the area?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, while I understand your position, I am not interested in offering a price that is lower than my initial proposal. I am not here to negotiate a price that is not reflective of the value of my property. I am, however, open to hearing your next offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I respect your stance. Since this is a newly built apartment, I am willing to offer 750 Euros per month, which I believe is a fair price considering the area and the amenities nearby. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 750 Euros per month is significantly lower than my initial proposal, and I am not willing to accept such a low price. I am, however, open to hearing your next offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I understand that my previous offer may have been too low. How about 800 Euros per month? This is a fair compromise, in my opinion, and reflects the balance between the quality of the apartment and the market rates in the area.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 800 Euros per month is closer to my initial proposal, but I am still not willing to accept such a price. I am, however, open to hearing your next offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I appreciate your patience during this negotiation. I am willing to increase my offer to 825 Euros per month. This price is higher than the market average for unfurnished apartments in the area, and I believe it reflects the premium quality of your property. I hope this new offer is more acceptable to you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 825 Euros per month is still lower than my initial proposal, but it is closer to my expectations. I am willing to accept your offer of 825 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 825 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
